ygData.subject: Re: Greetings
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, I thank all of you for your warm reception of me to your list.  I am currently playing way to many characters *smile*.  I play mostly on The Rathe
ygData.messageBody:
Hello,
I thank all of you for your warm reception of me to your list. I am
currently playing way to many characters *smile*. I play mostly on The Rathe
server, but have started a druid on Brell. I will be joining the Sisterhood
with her as soon as im old enough to travel to Freeport. I am determined to
stay near Kelethin until I reach 9th level. I must get the ability to
meditate before traveling far (I cant stand not having it, makes me insane).
So since it so close to a spell level I figure I mine as well do that as well
before leaving.
I was curious to know if the possibility of taking this guild to multiple
servers was ever considered. I know that when my Husband started his
guild... he was told that once it was approved that he was welcome to start
his guild on "any and all servers". I ask simply because I find the whole
concept to be wonderfully rich in role-play potential, but people can never
really leave there main characters... admit it hehe if we leave them for to
long we feel guilty lol.
Anyhow it was just a thought :) I look forward to seeing more of you in game
as well as here, until then safe travels and good hunting to all of you.

Marigold
